name: Infecto
description: A mad scientist created a deadly virus. Mankind is on the verge of extinction. People turn into zombie mutants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 10 Processor: Dual Core 1.5 Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 Mb GLSL Shader Support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.2 Ghz+ Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: 2048 Mb GLSL Shader Support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
